fields.summary: AdMob: Parity between Android and iOS

issuetype.description: An improvement or enhancement to an existing feature or task.
issuetype.name: Improvement

status.description: The issue is open and ready for the assignee to start work on it.
status.name: Open

fields.description:
Android and iOS have a lot of parity issues now due to different implementation of interstitial and rewarded video ads. We should follow the direction where Android is going with different proxies for the different ad types to achieve parity between the two platforms.

At the same time we can use this opportunity to move the module to a Swift code base.
fields.summary: AdMob: Migrate iOS to Swift and add parity with Android

comments.body:
The following work-in-progress PRs are addressing this ticket.

Android: https://github.com/appcelerator-modules/ti.admob/pull/89
iOS: https://github.com/appcelerator-modules/ti.admob/pull/86
